overview: DANCE ANGELS is a feel-good dance musical filmed in stunning locations around the picturesque coastal city of Alicante,Spain. The story is centered around two young angels and their friends who take on a 48 hour dance challenge to save the yacht of a local much loved Captain. The story is full of humor with colorful and quirky characters, accompanied by great dance scenes and the best of music soundtracks by leading American composers/writers
title: Dance Angels
